mapper.select: /* SQL ID : FromDeptInfo.selectList */ SELECT CODE AS DEPT_CD , PCODE AS UP_DEPT_CD , NAME AS DEPT_NM , CENTTYPE AS CNTR_TYPE_CD , USE_YN AS USE_YN , ORDSEQ AS ODR , ZIPCODE AS ZIP , ADDR1 AS ADDR1 , ADDR2 AS ADDR2 , PHONE AS TELNO , FAX AS FXNO , CENTAREA AS JRSDC_AREA , LOCACODE AS RGN_CD FROM SMBI.VT_SEDA_DEPTINFO
